app.name: USB Loader GX
app.long_description: USB Loader GX is an USB-Game-Loader with a GUI made with libwiigui. You can install your games to your HDDs and play them. It is an interactiv GUI where you can fully use WiiMote Pointer/Classic Controller and Gamecube Controller. Coders: dimok/nIxx/cyrex/giantpune/Hungyip84/Neorame/WiiShizza/ardi.
